com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radiusnetworks.campaignkit.Configuration

  • public final class Configuration
extends Object
    Configuration settings for a Campaign Kit.

    This represents all of the necessary, and some optional, settings necessary to run a Campaign Kit. This is used by a CampaignKitManager to determine how to sync with the cloud server and transmit usage statistics.

    Since:
    0.6.0
    See Also:
    CampaignKitManager

    • Field Detail

      • CONFIG_ANALYTICS_URL

        public static final String CONFIG_ANALYTICS_URL
        URL to app specific kit endpoint on the analytics server.

        This key is optional. Omitting this key will prevent analytics data from being sent to the Radius Networks servers.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_API_TOKEN

        public static final String CONFIG_API_TOKEN
        Required. App secret API token used to authenticated with Campaign Kit.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_API_URL

        public static final String CONFIG_API_URL
        Required. URL to app specific kit endpoint on the Campaign Kit server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_CELLULAR_DATA

        public static final String CONFIG_CELLULAR_DATA
        Flag allowing the use of cellular connections for data sync and usage statistics uploads.

        Default is true. Note: both null and the empty string are consider absence of values, resulting in this being set to true. Any other value is considered false.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_PARTNER_ID

        public static final String CONFIG_PARTNER_ID
        The partner identifier string for analytics.

        Limited to 255 characters. Default value null.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_PK_TOKEN

        public static final String CONFIG_PK_TOKEN
        Required. App secret API token used to authenticated with Proximity Kit.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_PK_URL

        public static final String CONFIG_PK_URL
        Required. URL to app specific kit endpoint on the Proximity Kit server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_SYNC_INTERVAL

        public static final String CONFIG_SYNC_INTERVAL
        Length of time, in milliseconds, between syncs with the Campaign Kit server.

        In the event that a campaign is added or updated on the server, the app must sync in order to receive this new information. However, syncing does tax battery life if performed too often, so we do not recommend setting this very low.

        Minimum value is 300000L ms. Default value is 3600000L ms.

        If this is not set in the configuration, is set to null, or is the empty string then the default value is used.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONFIG_SEGMENT_TAGS

        public static final String CONFIG_SEGMENT_TAGS
        List of comma separated tags sent to the server to segment Campaign data.

        The tags are OR'd on the server. Any Campaign which matches at least one tag will be sync'd with the device.

        Acceptable formats for string lists include:

        • [val1, val2, val3]
        • [val1,val2,val3]
        • ["val1","val2","val3"]
        • val1, val2, val3
        • val1,val2,val3
        Since the value is converted to a string using String.valueOf(Object) it is possible to provide a List<String> or JSONArray of strings as well. Those will convert to strings of the form [val1, val2, val3] and ["val1","val2","val3"] respectively.

        The tags _android and _all will be merged with the list automatically.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SYNC_INTERVAL

        public static final long DEFAULT_SYNC_INTERVAL
        Default sync interval in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_SYNC_INTERVAL

        public static final long MIN_SYNC_INTERVAL
        Minimum sync interval in milliseconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUIRED_KEYS

        public static final List REQUIRED_KEYS
        Immutable list of configuration keys required to be set.

        Contains:

        • CONFIG_API_TOKEN
        • CONFIG_API_URL
        • CONFIG_PK_TOKEN
        • CONFIG_PK_URL

    • Constructor Detail

      • Configuration

        public Configuration(Map config)
        Create a Campaign Kit configuration using the provided Map.

        The provided config must contain values for all required keys. Any additional keys are optional. For any optional key omitted from the map the documented default values will be used.

        Parameters:
        config - Settings for connecting with a Campaign Kit. Keys are accessed via the above CONFIG_* constants. Values, except for null, are converted to strings using String.valueOf(Object).
        Throws:
        InputMismatchException - If there was an error parsing the list of tags.
        MissingKeyException - If config does not contain one or more required keys.
        MissingValueException - If config contains null or an empty string for a required key value.
        NullPointerException - If config is null.
        NumberFormatException - If the value set for Configuration.CONFIG_SYNC_INTERVAL cannot be parsed into a long.

    • Method Detail

      • allowsCellularData

        public boolean allowsCellularData()
        Lookup if usage of cellular data is allowed for network communications.

        Default is true.

        Returns:
        true if cellular data connections are allowed for network communication; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Configuration.isCellularDataAllowed()

      • getAnalyticsURL

        public String getAnalyticsURL()
        Lookup the analytics url registered for the Campaign Kit.
        Returns:
        The registered analytics url. Will not be null or an empty string.

      • getApiToken

        public String getApiToken()
        Lookup the registered Campaign Kit API token.
        Returns:
        The registered API token to use to access the Campaign Kit server. Will not be null or an empty string.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getApiUrl()

      • getApiUrl

        public String getApiUrl()
        Lookup the registered Campaign Kit API resource URL.
        Returns:
        The registered API resource URL associated with the Campaign Kit. Will not be null or an empty string.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getApiToken()

      • getKitId

        public String getKitId()
        The Campaign Kit identifier extracted from the API resource URL.
        Returns:
        The identifier for this Campaign Kit as referenced by the API resource URL. May be null or an empty string if the API resource URL was malformed.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getApiUrl()

      • getPartnerId

        public String getPartnerId()
        Lookup the partner identifier used for grouping usage statistics.
        Returns:
        The registered partner identifier used to group analytics. May be null if no identifier was registered.

      • getProximityKitApiToken

        public String getProximityKitApiToken()
        Lookup the registered Proximity Kit API token.
        Returns:
        The registered API token to use to access the Proximity Kit server. Will not be null or an empty string.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getProximityKitApiUrl()

      • getProximityKitApiUrl

        public String getProximityKitApiUrl()
        Lookup the registered Proximity Kit API resource URL.
        Returns:
        The registered API resource URL associated with the Proximity Kit. Will not be null or an empty string.
        See Also:
        Configuration.getProximityKitApiToken()

      • getSyncInterval

        public long getSyncInterval()
        Lookup the cloud server data sync interval in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The registered interval, in milliseconds, for syncing data with the cloud servers. If no interval was registered will return the default value of 3600000L. This value will never be less than 300000L.

      • getTags

        public Set getTags()
        Lookup the tags to send to the Campaign Kit server to segment Campaign data.
        Returns:
        An immutable set of the registered tag list. Will not be null or the empty set. Will always contain at least the tags: _android and __all.

      • isCellularDataAllowed

        public boolean isCellularDataAllowed()
        Lookup if usage of cellular data is allowed for network communications.

        Default is true. This is an alias for Configuration.allowsCellularData() to work with beans / common reflection rules.

        Returns:
        true if cellular data connections are allowed for network communication; false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Configuration.allowsCellularData()
